DOC.brief_title: Sublingual Misoprostol Treatment Incomplete Abortion : Operations Research
DOC.detailed_description: This open-label feasibility study seek examine potential 400Î¼g sublingual misoprostol treatment incomplete abortion provide tertiary hospital .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Confirmed incomplete abortion 2 . No known contraindication study drug 3 . Uterine size large 12 week time presentation care 4 . No sign severe infection , define least two follow : foul smell discharge , fever > 38 degree C , 100 degree Fahrenheit uterine tenderness . 5 . No hemodynamic disturbance ( pulse > 110/min systolic bp < 100 ) 6 . General good health 7 . Agree comply study procedure include return follow visit 8 . Live work within one hour study site 9 . Willing able sign consent form 1 . Inability provide inform consent
